timeline.message:
Fix/tbd 9558): correct cxf lib names (#1251)

* feat(TBD-9558): correct jar names
fix(TBD-9948): compile error for tHCatalog components (#1255)

fix(TBD-9954): NoClassDefFoundError in javax/ws/rs/ProcessingExceptionException (#1263)

* fix(TBD-9954): Exception in thread main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError in javax/ws/rs/ProcessingExceptionException
fix(TBD-9970): NoClassDefFoundError: javax/ws/rs/MessageProcessingException in tDBFS components

timeline.bodyText: Is it intended that cxf-rt-core was removed ?

timeline.bodyText: Do you know if upgrading to bigdata-launcher-2.1.0 and removing cxf from there will work ?
